source: regeneration overhauling redevelopment rebuilding reconstruction gentrification
lemma: regenerate overhaul redevelop rebuild reconstruct gentrify
definitions: The act or process of regenerating or being regenerated.
The process of renewal, restoration, and growth.
The process of making extensive repairs or improvements to something.
The process of developing again or being developed again.
The action or process of building something again.
The action or process of reconstructing or being reconstructed.
The process of renovating and improving a house or district so that it conforms to middle-class taste.
examples: The overhauling of the engine improved its performance.
The redevelopment project revitalized the neighborhood.
The rebuilding of the bridge took several months.
The reconstruction of the historical site was meticulous.
Gentrification led to higher property values.
